data.name: Rustled Pete
data.detailed_description:
Rustled Pete is an arcade platformer where you control a chicken that has an egg as it's weapon. Fight Pete and beat him to unlock new Pete forms to challenge yourself!


Gameplay
  • You only have one life, but I'm sure you will manage!
  • Accumulate your combo counter and time your attacks to deal devastating blows to Pete!
  • Play against four Pete forms and test your skills as Pete becomes angrier and angrier in each form!

data.short_description: Rustled Pete is an arcade boss fighting platformer where you play as a chicken that is fighting for it's life against the very rustled and angry Pete. Challenge yourself by beating Pete and unlock new Pete forms. Put Pete in his place!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
